title: Kona Grill is classified as a Classic American grill
statement: Kona Grill identifies itself as a Classic American grill that serves steaks, seafood, sushi and margaritas.

citations.quote: At Kona Grill, we are a Classic American grill featuring an array of delicious menu items including hearty steaks and fresh seafood complemented by the best choice of sushi and margaritas at any grill in America.
